name: RollaBlaze
description:
Amstrad Emulator is required (Winape is recommended)

There is a tiny manual inside which reading is recommended.

Predefined controls*:

• A: Move left
• W: Move up
• S: Move down
• D: Move right
• P: Pause the game

*For true retro players, controls can be redefined on menu

More similar videogames.
